mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(id, passwd, name, email) VALUES(#{id}, #{passwd}, #{name}, #{email})
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, email, TO_CHAR(regdate, 'yyyy-MM-DD') regdate FROM member ORDER BY regdate DESC
SELECT id, name, email, TO_CHAR(regdate, 'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') regdate FROM member WHERE name LIKE '%' || #{value} || '%'
SELECT id, name, email, TO_CHAR(regdate, 'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') regdate FROM member WHERE id = #{value} OR name LIKE '%' || #{value} || '%'
